Description: Lip sherd of Attic (?) black-glazed pottery cup; lightly concave lip with offset below on interior; glazed black on interior and exterior; top of lip reserved; inscription cut on exterior of lip.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 473)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1601)
